text: The Guam Football Association is the governing body of association football in the United States territory of Guam. ==Association staff== {|class="wikitable hlist" style="text-align:left" !Name !Position !Source |- | Valentino San Gil |President | |- | Pascual Artero |Vice President | |- | Joseph Cepeda |2nd Vice President | |- | Marvin Iseke |General Secretary | |- | George Lai |Treasurer | |- | Kim Sang-hoon |Technical Director | |- | Karl Dodd |Team Coach (Men's) | |- | Kim Sang-hoon |Team Coach (Women's) | |- | Jill Espiritu |Media/Communications Manager | |- | Pascual Artero |Futsal Coordinator | |- |n/a |Referee Coordinator | |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Official website * Guam at the FIFA website. * Guam at the AFC website.
